name: Mr. Heli
summary: It is your mission, 'Mr. Heli' our hero, to unmask 'The Muddy' who is hiding deep underground and rescue the planet. Clear all the zones including floating green islands, moving rock beds, mysterious underground temples, and much more! The exhilarating air battle and stunning graphics capture the true character of the arcade machine. Play sharp, steer right, keep up with the fight!

name: Mr. Hoob!
summary: "Mr. Hoob!" is a colorful remaster of a FICTIONAL 2006 3D-platformer where you play as an energetic and always smiling platform-hopping character who shoots golden rings from his eyes at blue and green aliens! BEWARE; This game gets darker as it progresses...

name: M_rdle
summary: A horror word game where you try to solve the words before being drilled.

name: Mr. Blob's Honey-Do List
summary: Mr. Blob's Honey-Do List is a local coop NES inspired game. Enjoy three scenarios each with different game play styles and comic relief.

name: Mr. Robot
summary: Mr. Robot is a 3D action-puzzle-adventure-rpg. Inspired by classic filmation games such as Knight Lore and Alien8 and mixed with 'Ghost Hack' — an abstract RPG in which the player hacks into computer terminals and battles defensive computer programs.

name: Mr. Meat: Horror Escape Room
summary: A mad butcher has kidnapped a young girl and keeps her locked in his house. Enter into his baleful home and rescue the girl, you have only 5 hours.

name: Mr. Brocco & Co.
summary: Mr. Brocco & Co is a classic 2D platform game set in a fantasy world where junk food is trying to take over! Choose one of two characters (Mr. Broccoli or Super Asparagus) to save the city!

name: Mr. Driller: Drill Spirits
summary: Mr. Driller, experienced with the drill, much use his abilities to dig beneath the Earth's crust in a race to the finish in order to save the day. Dangerous traps await as you dig through the puzzle layout to the goal, and be careful of Mr. Driller's air supply which can run out quickly. Find the right powerups to increase abilities and air supply while fighting the time clock.

name: Mr. Driller
summary: The WonderSwan port of Mr. Driller.

name: Mr. Shorty
summary: A retro top-down RPG shooter indie game where you play as Mr. Shorty: the heroic ranger in the wild west. Unlock weapons, take on bounties and discover the dormant evil behind the recent onslaught of bandit attacks.

name: Mr. Yo-Yo
summary:
You control Mr. Yo-Yo. You are given five lives at the start of the game – one in play, and another four in reserve. The object of the game is to descend to the bottom of the cave, and rescue the Notelies by returning them to the top of the cave. When a Notely is ready to be rescued, he will appear in the little bucket area at the bottom of the cave. To pick up the Notely, descend to the bottom of your string. Mr. Yo-Yo will begin flashing various colors to indicate you’ve picked up a Notely. Then, return to the top of the screen to release the Notely to freedom! Mr. Yo-Yo will then return to his normal color, and you can get ready to rescue the next Notely. Sometimes, you may have to shoot some enemies to get the Notelies to appear. The further you get into a level of caves, the more timid the Notelies become. You’ll have to shoot more and more enemies for them to have enough courage to appear.

There are five different types of creatures inside the caves (Blobs, Flappers, Bouncers, Stunners, and Snippers). If Mr. Yo-Yo comes in contact with any of them, he’ll lose a life. Some of these creatures may also interact with Mr. Yo-Yo’s string in various ways. So be sure to keep an eye out above you if you’re spending a lot of time at the bottom of one of the caves!

You'll find various objects in the caves that can help you out. Coins, which you can collect or shoot. Power Pods, which you can also collect or shoot, but it's better to collect them (just as with the coins). However, shooting a Power Pod will clear the screen of enemies! Bonus Targets fly around in Bonus Caves -- shooting ten of them will cause the Bonus Gem to appear. Collect the Bonus Gem and bring it to the top of the cave before the time expires for a large point bonus and extra life!

The game ends when you have lost all your lives.

name: Mr. Steal Yo Wifi
summary: Sneak your way around the building to download pictures on your neighbour's wifi. Hide from their sight behind curtains, inside the shower or the closets, and whistle to distract them.

name: Mr. DO!
summary: Mr. Do! is an arcade game created by Universal in 1982. Similar in some ways to Namco's popular Dig Dug title, Mr. Do! was also popular and saw release on a variety of home video game consoles and systems. It is the first game in the Mr. Do series, and was released both as a standalone game and as a conversion kit (released by Taito Corp.) for existing arcade cabinets. It was one of the first arcade games to be released as a conversion kit, and went on to sell 30,000 units in the United States. It was also a popular choice on the 1983 video arcade-based game show Starcade.

name: !mrak
summary: Immerse yourself in an alternate 2003 Hokkaido, where technology, politics, and criminal intrigue intertwine in the shadows. Use stealth, weapons, and the environment to your advantage to survive in a world where someone is pulling the strings behind your every move.

name: Mr. Bean: Special Delivery
summary: No delivery job is too far for Bean and his trusty sidekick, Teddy! So buckle up and start your engines, in this awesome official Mr Bean game.

name: Mr. Bean Solitaire
summary: Who hasn't ever played the card game Solitaire? Now you can play the free online Mr Bean Solitaire game. You win the game when all four stacks are completed with their respective King! Boomerang is the best place for Mr Bean games!

name: Mr. Death: The Violent Silence
summary: Mr. Death is a Terrifying Thriller where you take place as a detective named Sebastian Moonshade in the open world of Woodcarve Town. Your mission is to investigate the murders of the killer Vincent Crowfield whilst playing against his state-of-the-art AI that learns from your actions.

name: Mr. Mix
summary:
Based on the infamous game described on the popular creepypasta of the same name.
Mr. Mix from Castilan Games  is a faithful recreation of the mysterious typing game for PC. On Mr. Mix from Castilan Games  you can either challenge the practically impossible original game mode or play the hacked game mode so you can reach the ominous level 6.

name: Mr. Parkour
summary:
Mr. Parkour" is a 2d arcade parkour platformer game. Run through dangerous levels, jump through enemies and leave obstacles behind you.

60 levels of crushing difficulty, driving soundtrack, a sea of enemies and traps! Can you get to the end without breaking your keyboard or gamepad? Then you are a real parkourist! But be careful, the enemies are everywhere and they do not sleep..

Game Features:
- 60 levels with increasing difficulty
- Old school gameplay
- Nice pixel art graphics
- Control your character using the keyboard or the gamepad

name: Mr. Magic
summary: Mr. Magic is an awesome, third-person, action-adventure game where you become a superhero. Unlock powerful skills by visiting secret places around the globe to retrieve mystical skills before they fall into the wrong hands. Master extraordinary abilities with mystical secrets!

name: Mr. Barrel
summary: Meet Mr. Barrel who sometimes works at a restaurant, and sometimes fights against dark forces!

name: Mr. Elevator
summary: We are developing a puzzle solving game with an elevator motif. This game is currently in the early stages of development, but we plan to upload images and demos of the work in progress. Please follow us and add us to your wishlist!

name: Mr. Pumpkin and a Cat Reporter: Adventure Bundle
Mr. Pumpkin Series Bundle
summary: CottonGame's empty-headed protagonist is back for a new round of puzzle-filled fun in Mr. Pumpkin 2: Walls of Kowloon! This bundle contains Mr. Pumpkin 2 and Mr. Pumpkin‘s first Adventure.

name: Mr. Meat
summary: After a long time in isolation, something appears inside your fridge. Satisfy the meat, or resist it.

name: Mr Mitty and the Itty Bitty Kitty Committee
summary: Disaster has struck the island of cats! A ferocious storm has snatched the committee's important letters, plunging the feline paradise into chaos. But fear not, Mr. Mitty, is on the case!

name: Mr.Bottle and His Dream
summary: Mr. Bottle lives in a small wine cellar. Perhaps unwilling to be ordinary, or perhaps his heart longing something, he decides to depart and seek a dream of his own. It's a retro cross-board physics indie game with a single player storyline and a multiplayer racing mode.

name: Mr. Platformer
summary: Run! Jump? Swim?! Mr. Platformer can do it all!

name: Mr Love: Queen's Choice
summary:
Who will be your soul mate? Mr Love: Queen's Choice is a romance simulation game that gives you the opportunity to text, chat and even call the main characters while developing your own career as a media producer.

In a world filled with superpowers, fantasy, and surprise, you will experience a girl’s whole life and get deeply involved with 4 male characters, feeling their romance, love, mystery and conflict in a deep story spanning dozens of episodes.

name: Mr Tomato Adventures
summary: Save the Fruit Kingdom by facing Powerful Bosses! This is a challenging 2D game that requires Precision and Courage. Don’t be fooled by the cute visuals — this game will test the most skilled players on the mission to save the Fruit Kingdom!

name: Mr.Mine
summary: Get rich or die mining! Idle your way through the mines, unearth treasures, and discover what great mysteries lie in the depths below!

name: Mr.Slime in Dungeon
summary: A 2D side-scrolling adventure. Run, jump, and slide as you explore dungeons, collect coins, and unlock the portal chest to advance to the next stage. Help Mr. Slime achieves his goal of becoming the richest slime in the dungeon.

name: Mr Donald
summary: MR DONALD — the game of the decade. You’re the hero, the hope of gamers and the entire world. Defeat every enemy with your partner and make gamedev great again!

name: Mr.Chip
summary: Will the main character who turns into a chip survive? Pick a good card and make the main character stronger to survive!

name: Mr Rabbit's Memory
summary: Game is meant to improve vocabulary and memorizing skills of playing children. Kids will learn new shapes, colours,numbers and letters in addition to spending a lot of time having fun

name: Mr. Whiskers Bubbles
summary: Shoot the bubbles and match 3 of the same color. A beautiful classic with kitties!

name: Mr. President
summary: Can you face the challenges of the Oval Office? Find out in Mr. President, a sandbox simulation of the U.S. presidency. Pursue your legislative agenda. Compete with rivals Russia and China. Deal with crises from 9/11 to COVID-19; and direct the U.S. military against terror groups and rogue states.

name: Mr. Buttman's Grand Opening
summary: Mr. Buttman was born with a fully functioning butt on his head. In fact, breathes through the butt, to the disgust of everyone around him. Despite his chronic bad breath, he's trying to start up his restaurant. His restaurant's grand opening is very soon. There's no time to waste!

name: Mr. Kicker - Perfect Kick Soccer Game
Mr. Run and Jump
summary: Mr Run and Jump draws you in with precise level design, free-flowing gameplay, and formidable challenge. Silky controls encourage players to run, jump, dash, double jump, and roll to clear levels with style, making it a speedrunner’s dream. Collectibles hidden in tough-to-reach spots demand players use their wits as well as their dexterity. Dynamic Assistance options allow players to set the level of difficulty they want. No matter how you play, Mr Run and Jump offers engaging gameplay options to players of varying skill levels and approaches.

name: Mr Right Simulator
summary: A youth to his student era,, 、awakening a Temporal Love System. With wingman Tong Jincheng, he navigates campus innocence and corporate battles using future intel. Bonds with 7 girls across timelines—witness you from bike to AMG. Can spacetime's equation balance love and ambition?

name: Mr. Lupin
summary: On a wonderful winter night, the moonlight bathes the silent streets, your own footsteps echoing softly. But wait... did you just hear someone whispering your name?

name: Mroi
summary: A game about being stuck in your room in a cycle of waking up, just to go back to sleep. The solitude of your dreams has been disturbed. An unknown guest. What is the life you were living beyond your dreams? What life did this mysterious figure live? Explore the dreamlands and figure it out.

name: Mr. Pumpkin 2: Kowloon Walled City
summary: Mr. Pumpkin 2: Kowloon Walled City is a sequel to the Mr. Pumpkin franchise. Our protagonist, an insignificant guy with a pumpkin head, will explore the Kowloon Walled City of Hong Kong, and witness the stories happening within these walls.

name: Mr Magpie's Harmless Card Game
summary: A push-your-luck roguelike deckbuilder. Set in a corporate backrooms. Played against a creepy puppet.

name: Mr Bullet 3D
summary:
Mr Bullet is back; in bigger and badder action. Mr. Bullet 3D has upped the ante. Revamped with better graphics and gameplay - your next adventure will be unforgettable! Don't pass up the chance to become a super-agent and a legend!

Are you a big fan of strategic games, puzzles, and fights? With Mr Bullet 3D, you'll have the possibility of becoming a spy, hunting for clumsy assassins and criminals, and shooting them down to save hostages and re-establish justice. Relive the phenomenon of solving puzzles by shooting down the enemies.

name: mr.Vegan
summary:
Mr.Vegan is a game about a vegan bodybuilder flying on a chilli pepper in space... Oops spoiler... Not really, there are 3 locations: a City, a Desert, and Space. 
But this isn't all, whilst he's flying he only wears underpants for a... better experience... and better ventilation!

name: Mr. Billion
summary: Mr. Billion is an idle life and economic simulator where you'll rise from a homeless nobody to a wealthy tycoon! Make smart choices, climb the career ladder, and build your luxury life. Tap your way to billions and live like a true money king!

name: Mr. Photographer: Into The Light
summary: Dive into the captivating world of "Mr. Photographer - Into the Light", an action-packed platformer where every moment challenges your wit, strategy, and skill. With no paywalls or in-game purchases, this is a pure test of talent, patience, and wisdom. Every game is a fresh start, and every adventure demands a unique approach. Are you ready to rise from an intern to a master photographer?

name: Mrs.Cat In Mars
summary: Help Mrs.Cat to complete a mission: Explore Mars and collect the energy gems.In this 2d precision platformer, you'll have to memorize and face the invisible and visible deadly objects, running, jumping and meowing!

name: Mr. Pogo
summary: Hide the tears and ignore the pain in this ridiculous game about a Clown on a Pogo stick!

name: MRG: Matando Robôs Gigantes - O Jogo
Mr. Hopp's Manor Escape
summary: Toys-turned-monsters are roaming the manor. Find a way out and don't get caught!

name: Mr Moneybag
summary:
A little rogue-like about a bag of money in a hostile dungeon

Coins are your life, your weapon and your currency

You can shoot coins at shopkeepers to buy upgrades (and you can stand next to them to see what they're selling and how much it'll cost you). You can shoot coins at reds to kill them (or you can try to avoid them). You can even shoot coins at walls to destroy them, but every coin you shoot is one less coin in your bag, so use them sparingly!

Reds move after every second step you take, and if you end up next to a red when it's about to move, you lose a coin. If you get hit and have no coins, you’re dead, game over!

Step on the staircase to go down to the next floor of the dungeon. As you go deeper, enemies get tougher and spawn in greater numbers, and shopkeeper prices go up.

How many gems can you buy before you die?

name: Mr. Hibbl: The Lost Levels
summary:
In Mr. Hibbl: Lost Levels we have released lost levels that send Mr. Hibbl on a whole new journey! Join our brave hero on an exciting adventure through mysterious worlds long forgotten.
Explore mysterious environments, face tricky challenges and overcome exciting traps as you explore the lost levels.
Immerse yourself in a unique gameplay experience that features gripping action and surprising twists.
Are you ready to face this unknown challenge and join Mr. Hibbl on his new journey?
Good luck and may your adventure begin!

name: Mr. Meat 2: Prison Break
summary: Mr. Meat is back!

name: Mr. Nutz: Hoppin' Mad
summary: Similarities with the other Mr. Nutz game only go as far as the title and main character, although both are side-scrolling platform games. Mr. Nutz the squirrel is holidaying on Peanut Planet when he's called into action to save the local people from a race of chickens. Nutz can fly, swim and dive through the planet on his quest. The level layouts include tunnels and warp zones. Bonus items and additional weapons including bombs are available along the way.

name: Mr. Goemon
summary:
Mr. Goemon is a side-scrolling-platform game developed by Konami in 1986.
Enemies charge and grab the character, ending his life unless the player jostles the control stick to break free. Later enemies also have projectile weapons that the player must dodge. They are defeated by throwing a found object at them or hitting them with an always-equipped pipe. Jumping on the enemies' heads will push them down a level or off the screen entirely. Levels feature either boss battles or a pile of gold bars at the end, worth various points depending on the level.

name: Mr Rabbit's Alphabet Forest Adventure
summary: Mr. Rabbit's Alphabet Adventure is an educational game for children designed to teach the alphabet. Children are leading Mr Rabbit through a maze. In order to proceed they need to trace the letters.The quiz feature allows children to test their knowledge of writing and listening to letters sounds.

name: Mr Rabbit's Cambridge: Point and Click Adventure
summary: Discover an imagery Cambridge in this dynamic point and click adventure game. Find Mr Rabbit before The SS P320 leaves!

name: Mr. Grin's Final Act
summary: Thirty years ago, a tragedy closed the studio forever. Now you're back... and so is Mr. Grin. Explore abandoned TV sets. Stay out of sight. Piece together the truth. In this first-person survival horror, you're not just running from death — you're trapped in someone else's twisted encore.

name: Mr. Gimmick! 2 Shadow's Revenge
summary: Gimmick is back in this all new, action packed adventure! It was several years ago that he captivated our hearts as he set out to rescue his owner from the toy dimension and its ruler, Shadow. In this game, the little girl is now a grown woman with a child of her own, Maddie. When she feels Maddie is old enough, she gives her Gimmick to take care of. As Maddie sleeps, the evil Shadow returned, kidnapping Maddie and taking her to the toy dimension. Gimmick must go back to the toy dimension and rescue Maddie from the evil clutches of Shadow. Join Gimmick as he fights through seven all new levels, packed full of new enemies and new bosses! Will Gimmick rescue his new owner, or will Shadow get his revenge?

name: Mr. Golden Revenge Machine
summary: The game is a reference to Puyo Puyo games, inspired by Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine/Dr. Fetus' Mean Meat Machine, it's mostly Tetris.

name: Mr. Sweet
summary:
Mr. Sweet - this is the crazy adventure of the most unusual runner in the universe! Help him and his friends to become the best of the best and beat all known and unknown records!
Check your agility on the most complicated tracks in different parts of the universe!

name: Mr. Bommels Teacats
summary: Visit Mr. Bommel's TEACAT Factory in this Short Visual Novel and create your own unique magical teacat.

name: Mr Boom's Firework Factory
summary:
You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps!

Move Mr Boom's firework crates from the machines to the exit without destroying them. Beware though, as nothing is quite what it seems in the Firework Factory!

This fast moving puzzle game features high quality effects and graphics, with lots of explosions.

Work your way through the factory's many tasks whilst avoiding explosions, to reveal the truth behind the firework factory and your enigmatic boss, Mr Boom...

name: Mr. Donovan
summary:
Harness your MOBA skills, and dominate the first of the SOBOs! Discover the Single-player Online Battle Open-world genre, fight for your life, explore an alien planet, defend your crashed ship, survive arena battles, encounter intelligent adversaries, and earn the love of appropriately odd pets.   
   
Contact: info@mrdonovangame.com

name: Mr. Prepper: Uranium Project
summary: Gain access to a long-abandoned nuclear power plant, manage unstable uranium to craft powerful tools and weapons, advance through a new storyline, and decorate your bunker in a whole new way!

name: Mr. E
summary: MR.E is a visual novel with turn-based puzzle mechanics in which you discover what happened to a spaceship heading to Titan. Overcome challenges thrown at you by the ship’s rogue AI and support the surviving crew members.

name: Mr Toilet
summary: Your toilet - your rules. Clean, charge fees, kick out freeloaders. Turn a filthy restroom into a royal, automated empire in an absurd simulator!

name: Mr.President!
summary: Mr.President! Can you take a bullet for the soon to be President of the United States of America?! You play as Dick “Rock-Hard” Johnson a bulletproof man, the best bodyguard money can buy. He is sworn to protect the most hated presidential candidate of all time Ronald Rump.

name: Mr. Driller: Drill Till You Drop
summary: Mr. Driller: Drill Till You Drop offes non-stop Drilling Action! Featuring the classic addictive gameplay that the series is known for, this DSi game has over 40 stages of non-stop drilling action! Drill through a seemingly endless onslaught of colored blocks, avoid falling obstacles, and strategically manage your oxygen on the go with your Nintendo DSi!

name: Mr. Dubstep
summary: Mr. Dubstep is a fun platformer with many colorful levels. The goal of the game is avoiding obstacles with various mechanics.

name: Mr. Driller 2
summary: Test your drill skills in Mr. Driller 2, a colorful puzzle game for the Game Boy Advance. In an effort to save the world from being buried under colored blocks, you must drill your way through a variety of intricate puzzles while avoiding enemies and obstacles. Based on the arcade version, the sequel to Mr. Driller features Mission Driller, Endless Driller, and Time Attack Driller modes, plus a two-player mode that lets you play against a friend via link cable.

name: Mr. Scientist
summary: Mr. Scientist is a single player horror game. You are a hostage of a mad scientist and now you need to escape from his house.

name: Mr. Jones: Retrubition
summary: Mr. Jones:Retrubition is a third-person action and adventure game. Paul Jones was a family man who lived an ordinary life. But one dark night, their lives turned upside down in a matter of seconds. Do you want to join Paul Jones' adventure right away?

name: Mr Farmboy
summary: MR FARMBOY is a cute colony farming automation game. Plant, grow, harvest, raise animals, hire workers, gather, craft, automate, and build a beautiful farm for villagers to visit.

name: Mrs. Santa's Gift Hunt
summary:
Christmas themed RPG. 
 
This game is a colectathon where you aim to get a high score that's awarded by doing various things in the game, including gathering presents.

name: Mr Wonder
summary: Explore an abandoned creator’s studio in this dark psychological horror experience. Survive lethal traps and twisted challenges. Uncover hidden secrets and the truth behind Mr Wonder.

name: Mr. Flipper
summary:
You are Mr. Flipper, the only Flipper in a pinball world. 
 
You can't wait for the ball to come to you, You'll have to move to the ball!

name: Mr. Prepper
summary:
Mr. Prepper is about to be prepared. You know something is wrong, the risk of a nuclear war is in the air and you need to be prepared for what's coming. They promised freedom but dealing with your paranoid government is just another day in this survival crafting game;

- Build an underground shelter
- Craft machines that can keep you alive; farms, greenhouses, tools, vehicles etc.
- Trade with neighbors, give them what they need, get what is useful to you
- Make a plan, you need to get out of this country
- Beaware of the secret police, they don't want you to be prepared, they want you to stay in their control

Mr. Prepper is the guy who live in a country which once was the land of freedom but step by step its government changed everything. If you don't obbey - you dissapear. Be as they want you to be or be gone. Our hero decided to opose, to get out of this delusion of life. The only way for him to hide his plans and his doings is to build an underground shelter and construct a machine that helps him get out across the border. But he will need materials, materials so rare in this world - help him get them, help him escape without being discovered.

name: Mr. Do!'s Castle
summary: Mr. Do!, that king of arcade clowns, is in a bit of a bind - again! This time, a pack of pesky unicorns is trampling the bricked hallways of his castle. Help Mr. Do! rid his dwelling of these crafty, quick-changing (and deadly) creatures with the skillful swing of a hammer. Sometimes a quick clobber to the head will do it. Or maybe a well chosen brick knocked out from above. If you can't stop these critters, then break a hole in the floor to slow 'em down. It's up to you to know when to fight - or when to flee! Tension mounts as you hurry Mr. Do! through the castle's maze, grabbing keys along the way. Only when Mr. Do! has collected all the keys can he unlock the castle door, and open up an extra chance to beat these nasty critters!

name: Mr. Hopp's Hunting Hour
summary: Mr. Hopp, a creepy rabbit doll that has come to life, is trying to get inside the house! Check all doors, windows and vents to make sure he can't find any way in. Avoid the toys on the floor, the sound draws him in.

name: Mr Bean Solitaire Adventure
summary: Mr Bean Solitaire Adventure is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Pointvoucher, which was released in 2019.

name: Mr. Ashfish's Distant Rehab
summary: Mr. Ashfish's Distant Rehab is a classic Point & Click FMV adventure—straight out of the ‘90s. Live-action actors, 3D-rendered backgrounds using the latest technology available in 1995, traditional mechanics, and a gripping, irony-laced story—all come together in a game that lets players fully immerse themselves in the nostalgic world of early PC gaming. Runs on virtually any hardware!

name: Mr. Shifty
summary:
Quit creeping through shadows, stop surveilling security patterns, and ditch the fancy toys. An expert thief and master of infiltration, Mr. Shifty can get inside any place he wants with just the power of his fists…okay, teleporting helps.

A speed-stealth, kung-fu brawler about a teleporting thief, Mr. Shifty combines fast top-down gameplay with the ferocity of '90s Hong Kong action cinema, coming to PC (Win/Mac), PS4, and Xbox One in 2017.

Pummel your way through 75 levels of heists, rescue missions, boss battles, and down-'n'-dirty brawls. Outsmart your opponents by luring them into traps and tricking them into shooting each other. Activate slow-motion to dodge when the gunfire gets too thick, and watch your back, because it only takes one bullet to bring you down.

Newly announced from indie publisher tinyBuild GAMES, Mr. Shifty is the debut title from Team Shifty; a close-knit group of four developers from Brisbane, Australia, who previously worked as a team at Halfbrick for over five years and have collectively shipped 21 games for consoles and handheld.

name: Mr. Saitou
summary: A short game set in the Rakuen universe about an average white-collar worker who struggles to find meaning in a life full of constant overtime and isolation. After an accident lands him in the hospital, Mr. Saitou is spirited away to a strange fantasy world where an unexpected friend takes him on a life-changing adventure.

name: Mr. Driller Online
summary:
Players take on the role of a driller moving through levels of colorful blocks, avoiding the threat of being crushed by falling blocks, all while keeping their air supply from running out.

Mr. Driller Online features single player modes including Standard Driller and Quest Driller, as well as online multiplayer support for up to four players on Xbox LIVE. In online multiplayer mode, players can participate in a split screen Solo Battle, where the best score wins, or in Tag Battle, where friends team up in pairs to beat the game.

name: Mr. Prepper: Animal Farm
summary: Take care of the animals, repair the farm’s facilities, learn fishing, explore the new areas, adopt a dog, get to the bottom of the Agency’s special interest in the farm and discover the mystery lurking from above! Use what you learn on the farm in your shelter and breed your own animals!

name: Mr. Gold: Tooyama no Kinsan Space Chou
summary:
"Gold, they called him. Tall, courageous and known by all just men for two things: his lightning sword, and the cherry blossom tattoos that mark him as the most feared warrior in space."

"Samurai Gold is a bold space adventure that recasts a famed swordsman and genuine hero of old Japan - Toyama No Kinsan - in a future of interplanetary intrigue and rocket fast action. In the next century. major cities and space colonies are controlled by a huge computer system called " EDO". Utilising Edo's sophisticated information systems, five Senior Administrators rule the universe in peace. But evil still lurks in dark corners. And so like Kinsan before him. Samurai Gold acts as a quiet, sharp-eyed undercover agent, spotting criminals where no police force can go and bringing them to justice. The badge of his authority, just as was Kinsan's, is the tattoos of the samurai's sacred symbol, the cherry blossoms."

"Gold is a fair man, but his sense of justice explodes into a bomb of intense retribution and stunning action when criminals attack one of the five Senior Administrators - a man who also happens to be Samurai Gold's father..."

name: Mr Blaster
summary: Mr Blaster is a higher-level space adventure with an aim to conquest the universe. It’s a way to test strategic playing skills and the precision of shooting. A galactic war over the conquest of a planet and seizing the opponent’s flag

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse: The Toybox
summary: When Emmie brings home a toy rabbit she found in the woods, her mother, Kaiya, starts experiencing strange happenings inside their home as everything becomes a fight for survival.

name: Mr Investigator
summary: The Time Bureau sent us another unfortunate case to crack. Do what you do best - Use your detective skills, explore the written memories and restore the victim's diary.

name: Mr. Goofer’s Mini Game Arcade Party!
summary: A collection of over 30 arcade-inspired retro mini games, each with their own unique genre and style! It's a back-to-back marathon of playable, pixelated old-fashioned fun! What’s the highest score that YOU can reach?

name: Mr. Hibbl
summary: Jump, dodge, collect! There is a lot of action waiting for you in this entertaining platformer!

name: Mr. Driller
summary:
Mr. Driller is an arcade puzzle game developed by Namco and first released in 1999.
Players control a driller who descends through layers of colored blocks, clearing paths while managing a limited air supply. Blocks disappear when four or more of the same color are connected, creating strategic challenges as the screen scrolls upward. The game emphasizes quick decision-making and careful planning under time pressure. It became known for its simple mechanics, increasing difficulty, and bright visual style.

name: Mr. Maymunshine’s Christmas Land
summary: A cute holiday-themed side scrolling platformer for the Nintendo Entertainment System by calgames. Designed for kids, ages 4+

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse

name: MRC: Multi-Racing Championship
summary: Featuring up to 10 chooseable cars (many which open up later in the game), and three courses (plus mirror courses), Multi Racing Championship's biggest draw is the splendidly realistic feel of the cars themselves and the well designed courses on which they drive. The cars range from 4X4s, trucks, and off-road racers to slick street cars, Lamborghinis and the like. While initially it may seem like there is a deficit of courses, in fact, the multi-terrain courses contain mini-courses within each one. For instance, at least three times in each course, you will have the choice to take two different road directions -- either rough dirt track or snow-laden road, ot a slick but usually longer street course. Each car handles terrains differently, and some, like the trucks, obviously handle the off-roads better than others, but you can also modify your street car to handle dirst roads well, too.

name: Mr. Driller G
summary:
A.D 2000X in Tokyo, a mysterious occurrence of overflowing Blocks was halted by the actions of a Professional Excavator "Driller" by the name of Susumu Hori. Above ground, peace returned again.

Half a year passed, suddenly the Blocks began to overflow in three nations. One after another America, India and Egypt became flooded in blocks.

Susumu Hori and his Rival Driller, Anna Hottenmeyer; urgently began to dig to the depths of the earth. Meanwhile, Susumu's father, Taizou Hori; Susumu's elder brother, Ataru Hori; Anna's Robot Assistant, Horinger Z and Susumu's roommate, Puchi, were all digging to the depths of the earth, aiming for the resolution of this disaster.

What is the probable cause of this latest incident?
And, among the 6 Drillers, who will be the one to resolve this disaster?

Our hero can drill up, down, left and right. Drilling through single blocks would take forever, so it's fortunate that blocks of the same color form into groups that vanish when only one of the blocks is drilled. This allows for chain reactions, since vanishing blocks will often cause other blocks to fall and form new groups. Alas, these falling blocks are also deadly if they hit Mr. Driller.

If all Mr. Driller had to do was drill, life would be easy. But he also has to keep refilling his oxygen supply by collecting air capsules scattered throughout the blocks. The deeper he goes, the faster his air runs out. Hampering his progress even further are brown "X-blocks" that take five drill strikes to disappear and remove 20% of Mr. Driller's air when broken.

This game is a Japan-only port of the original Arcade game of the same name.

name: Mr.Do!
summary:
The object of Mr. Do! is to score as many points as possible by digging tunnels through the ground and collecting cherries. The title character, Mr. Do (a circus clown—except for the original Japanese version of the game, in which he is a snowman), is constantly chased by red monsters resembling small dinosaurs, and the player loses a life if Mr. Do is caught by one. The game is over when the last life is lost. 
 
Cherries are distributed throughout the level in groups of eight. 500 bonus points are awarded if Mr. Do collects eight cherries in a row without stopping. A level is complete when all cherries are removed, all monsters are destroyed, "EXTRA" is spelled, or a diamond is found. 
 
Mr. Do can defeat the monsters by hitting them with his bouncing "power ball" or by dropping large apples on them. While the power ball is bouncing toward a monster, Mr. Do is defenseless. If the ball bounces into an area where there are no monsters to hit (such as behind a fallen apple), Mr. Do cannot use it again until he has retrieved it. When the power ball hits a monster, it then reforms in Mr. Do's hands after a delay that increases with each use. 
 
Mr. Do or the red monsters can push an apple off the edge of a vertical tunnel and crush one or more monsters. If an apple falls more than its own height, it breaks and disappears. Mr. Do can also be crushed by a falling apple causing a loss of life.

Like its predecessor, no North American or Japanese Mega Drive versions were planned.

The world is your oyster as you assume the role of the most powerful person in the country. Swipe your presidential fingers left or right to impose your will upon Eagletopia as you listen to requests from your friends, enemies, multiple stooges, and people from both sides of the coin. With each request able to tip the scales, it is up to you to extend your presidential reign for as long as possible; you may lead Eagletopia to success or plunge it into the dark ages… The choice is all yours.
Perform a balancing act to please the people, the army, and the treasury while skirting the lines between a liberal or a conservative rule. All the while, combat forces that threaten to usurp you from the shadows through careful planning and forging the right alliances; do you have what it takes to sell your soul for success?
Eagle Sized Equipment: Need to expand your rule to space? Want to nuke an annoying neighbor? Earn the right equipment to climb up the ladder of power and exercise your right across the world!

Rampage through levels and shoot the alien scum in the face. Or behind, your choice. Eventually you’ll get yours kicked. Tough. Sucks to be you. But! With the loot you can find, you can get bigger and badder weapons that’ll leave a string of ruined enemies in their wake! By the end, there will be mo

How many plates can you make him spin even with interference from rascals, and the naughty plates which tend to fall... You will receive a standing ovation if you turn all the plates. name: Mr. Bean's Wacky World

name: Mr. Tiny Adventures

Drag your 30 grams of weight through various scenarios, where any single and common object can be a deadly enemy. You need to finish 9 levels of the game to get all the talismans to help you break the spell of the witch and restore your normal size. Mr Tiny, the great lover of beer, is depending on you. Drive through large areas of the kitchen, the pipes, the garden, the street... till the witch house ( your neighbor) Avoid the enemies that come your way, You can kill them as well as jump over them like in other games. Move objects to access to different higher places, which before he had to crouch down to get to. See how you can change the life of a single person in an extreme situation.

name: Mr. Driller: DrillLand
summary:
The popular action puzzle game “Mr. DRILLER DrillLand” makes its Western debut on the Nintendo Switch! You’re invited to a secret amusement park known as “DrillLand” – 500 meters underground! Explore and conquer the five “attractions” with simple, yet exciting, gameplay that guests of all ages can enjoy!

- Mr. DRILLER returns! – The first Mr. DRILLER game for the Nintendo Switch featuring updated graphics and HD cutscenes!
- Dig your way to victory! – Each of the five attractions in DrillLand features their own set of unique gameplay rules. Can you dig your way through each attraction and defeat the final boss?!
- Competitive multiplayer modes! – Play with up to 4 players on one console—race to the finish or battle it out in “Free-for-All” or “Pairs”!
- Take it easy! – All new “Casual Mode” for those who want to enjoy digging through DrillLand at a leisurely pace!

name: Mr. Splash

name: Mr.Robbo
summary: Mr.Robbo is a 2D logic game with action elements in the style of the 80s. Collect all the bots, clear the way to your flying saucer and try not to die from enemies, guns or magnets. 64 exciting levels await you. Good luck =)

Game Features: 
31 levels with increasing difficulty 
Old school gameplay 
Pixel art graphics 
Steam Achievements support 
Control your character from both the keyboard and the gamepad

Mr. Driller W is the new and updated installment of the exciting, classic game challenging you with level upon level of frantic, underground, drilling action! Experience more than 20 varied stages and missions!

Multiple degrees of difficulty now challenge everyone from the first time novice to the most hardcore, Mr. Driller veteran. The music for the Atari 8-bit version is by Gary Gilbertson (using Philip Price's Advanced Music Processor) and published in 1984 by Datamost. Robert McNally performed the Apple II translation.[2]

The player controls a humanoid robot that must climb and jump its way through a factory. The factory is filled with suspended platforms, ladders and conveyors belts.

The game includes a built-in level editor.

name: Mr. Krasnoludek, Teach Me Your Magic Spells

name: Mr. Cool

name: Mr. Kougar

name: Mr. Driller: Drill Land
summary:
A Japanese exclusive released in 2002 for GameCube.
The game could be connected to the Game Boy Advance game Mr. Driller Ace, another Japanese exclusive, to transfer pets to the GameCube and unlock power-ups for purchase.

A remastered version of the game was released worldwide in 2020 on Nintendo Switch and PC.

Mr. Driller: Drill Land is a sequel to Mr. Driller. The basic goal is like the original - players must dig through from top to bottom, aiming to reach the goal depth in meters. As they dig, they gradually lose air, so they must also collect air capsules to replenish their air and prevent losing a life.

Mr. Jong can temporarily defeat the ogres by crushing them with shoved tiles (similar to Pengo), or by collecting a special power tile and tagging an ogre (similar to Pac-Man).

Help Mr Jump to make his way through multiple of ingenious and tricky levels!

summary: Two otherworldly games featuring the incredible leaping Mrs.Cat

name: Mr. Driller
summary:
A port of Mr. Driller for the Game Boy Color,

Mr. Driller is an arcade puzzle game developed by Namco and first released in 1999.
Players control a driller who descends through layers of colored blocks, clearing paths while managing a limited air supply. Blocks disappear when four or more of the same color are connected, creating strategic challenges as the screen scrolls upward. The game emphasizes quick decision-making and careful planning under time pressure. It became known for its simple mechanics, increasing difficulty, and bright visual style.

name: Mr. Sensei: Life as a Foreign Teacher in Japan
summary: Decide the fate of a teacher! Every decision influences his relationships and leads to unique endings. Which will you choose?

name: Mr. Onion

name: Mr. Tuff
summary:
Mr. Tuff is a 2D platform game in development by Sales Curve Interactive (SCI) and presumably set to be published by Ocean in 1994-1995. The game was done by the same people as Super SWIV, and as such, the graphics are incredibly polished. The game was apparently too ambitious, and was never fully complete (although the game engine and graphics certainly indicate that it is close).

The game follows a demolition robot known as Mr. Tuff. After the entire population of earth escapes to the planet Utopia, the army robots take over the world. It is up to Mr. Tuff to save the world for the peaceful domestic robots. The levels involve standard platform action, though there are a few shooter-esce hoverboard levels. Each world is set up into standard levels and a boss level.

name: Mr. Bree: Returning Home
summary: Mr. Bree has lost his memory and forgot the way home! Now you gotta help him return home! For that, Mr. Bree needs to travel through the deepest and deadliest places, recovering his forgotten movement skills, and avoiding death at all cost while hoping to meet his family again.

name: Mr. Run & Jump + Kombinera Adrenaline

name: Mr Bean

name: Mr. Nibbles Forever

name: Mr. Bones

name: Mr. Wimpy
summary:
Mr. Wimpy is a platforming video game released by Ocean Software in 1984. The game was intended to be a promotional tie with Wimpy restaurants as their logos, company mascots, and theme tunes were reproduced. The game was released on the Oric 1, ZX Spectrum, BBC Micro and Commodore 64. The gameplay is similar to the video game BurgerTime.[1] 
 
Gameplay[edit] 
At the start of the game, Mr. Wimpy has to cross his kitchen while avoiding moving manholes to get to the larder so that he can collect ingredients and make his burgers. As an added hazard, a character called Waldo tries and steal these ingredients from him.[2] After the opening level, the game becomes a traditional platform game where the player must guide Mr. Wimpy across the platforms while walking over four various burger ingredients, which in turn causes them to crash to the platform below and finally to the four plates at the bottom.[2] Mr. Wimpy must also avoid various enemies in the guise of walking sausages, eggs, pickles, and spoons. Players have the ability to spray pepper at the enemies, which temporarily freezes them for a few seconds, allowing players to escape.[2] Enemies can also be trapped and squashed by walking over burger ingredients while they are on the level below.[3] 
 
The platform portion of the game features the following enemies: Sid Sos (a walking sausage), Ogy Egg (a walking fried egg), Sam Spoon (a walking spoon), and Pam Pickle (a walking pickle).[3] As the player progresses in the game, more enemies are added.[citation needed] Mr. Wimpy's only defences against the enemies are to either trap them between the falling burger ingredients or to temporarily freeze them with pepper.[citation needed] However, players can only a small supply of pepper at any given time (4 bottles could be carried).[2] Players can pick up coffee cups or ice creams that appear on the screen (when they are down to their last pepper pot), rewarding them with an extra pepper pot.[2] Players are given four lives at the start of the game, any of which can be lost in the opening Larder level by falling down a moving pothole or by getting caught by an enemy in the platform portion of the game.[citation needed]

name: Mr. Woodpecker
summary: You play as a detective investigating an empty hotel. You are close to solving the mystery of this hotel. Explore the rooms, look for items that will help you pass on. And do not forget to read the tips of the detective, for whom you play will periodically give out.

name: Mr. Akun's Jump
summary: This game is a casual adventure game where players use the mouse to click on Akun to generate a parabola, allowing him to jump from one platform to another. The goal is to guide him to the highest peak to retrieve the lost basketball!

name: Mr. Shootem Breaks Out!

name: Mr. Boop and the Curse of the Dinner Party

name: Mr. Balls

name: MR 333
summary: When the ritual begins it is feeding time. Find his substance or he will consume your body.
